website_summaries.verdict: A pair of aerator shoes that offers a good workout and a large surface area of coverage.
pros: Sandal straps are adjustable to fit over a variety of shoe types and sizes
Shoes contain 26 steel spikes all over the bottom to tackle dry and tough soil
Strong metal buckles support your shoes
cons: The straps can become loose as they move around larger yards

customer_reviews.title: Ok product. Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Does the job. The straps get loose easily and it comes off. You have to really spend the time to secure it. Otherwise it is good quality easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Muller

customer_reviews.title: The straps come loose and they need to be adjusted ...
customer_reviews.text: The straps come loose and they need to be adjusted frequently. I feel that a redesign could improve the ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Luis Morales

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective waste of time.
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. This tool only makes compacted soil MORE compacted. And I found it to be impossible to keep the tool securely attached to my shoes. One at a time, not both, works better but either way a huge waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: kiburi

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: If you have 0 rocks in your area, sure these might be what you want. Otherwise, pass. Mistake wasting money on these things. After one yard use, spikes were bent and pretty much useless. Was trashed a few days later. Rent an actual aerator and save time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely Practical and very light. And were very easy to use and Perfect for the Job. Very satisfied with the Purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you follow the instructions it's very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: If you follow the instructions it's very easy to assemble. Inexpensive and made of durable material. You cannot beat the price. I specially like the long spikes for making deep holes. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pelusa JJ

customer_reviews.title: The instructions were very clear and easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were very clear and easy to follow, although you do have to work a bit to assemble, the shoes look great and the presentation of the product is very nice. Great for a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Americo Abdula

customer_reviews.title: Steady while walking
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and steady while walking! 3 fasteners are more than enough due to green holders of the heels. Long fasteners easy to tie them up, see the pic.
customer_reviews.author: C. R.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Spikes are far too long and it is impossible to walk in. Hit a root and got stuck. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: WNC Mountains

customer_reviews.title: Nails broke off the bottom pretty easily.  Clay soil in NC...
customer_reviews.text: Nails broke off the bottom pretty easily. Clay soil in NC...
customer_reviews.author: Novate

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The straps don’t stay secured. They are impossible to use in Texas clay they either won’t go into the ground or the clay gets stuck in the spikes and you end up picking up chunks of your lawn. I also nearly broke my ankle trying to get the clay dislodged from them. So in conclusion they didn’t do a thing for my lawn and cost me a trip to the ER.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Revell

Fits all foot size!



100 % Satisfaction guarantee,our aerating shoes is backed up by our manufacturer with 30-day money back guarantee, no risk!
